paper.title: Implementation and critique of an algorithm which maps a relational database to a conceptual model

author.org: Stockholm University and the Royal Institute of Technology,

paper.venue: Conference on Advanced Information Systems Engineering
paper.abstract: The degree to which the creation of a conceptual model can be mechanized is a topic of investigation of considerable interest within the research area of semantic data modeling. This paper examines one such example in which the feasibility of mechanically creating a conceptual schema from a relational database is explored. The approach chosen to carry out the task of this translation is an algorithm
